means: 标示( indicate的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: He raised his glass and indicated that I should do the same.
sentence.Network_cn: 他举起了杯子并且示意我也应该这样做。

sentence.Network_en: He indicated the bedroom with a jerk of his head.
sentence.Network_cn: 他扭头指了指卧室的方向。

sentence.Network_en: U.S. authorities have not yet indicated their monetary policy plans.
sentence.Network_cn: 美国当局尚未透露他们的货币政策计划。

list.abs: 量指标（indicator）（与潜在变数相关的观察变数）或称指标变数（indicate variable），而对潜在变数间接地加以衡量。
化学试剂_百度百科 ... 显色剂 Developer 指示剂 Indicator 配位指示剂 Complexon indicator.
英语常见词根前缀后缀大全 ... encouraging 振奋人心的 indication 指示 relaxation 放松.
如下适应症(indications):1. 腹部无力这是绝对会发生的。
2008-10-18 -- 工业控制英语词汇大全 ... index 索引、指标，指针，指数 indicate 指示，表明 indicator 指示器.
大学英语精读单词表(第二册) - 豆丁网 ... belt n. (地)带 indicate vt. 显示，象征，指出 indication n. 指出，暗示，迹象.

entry.def: If one thing indicates another, the first thing shows that the second is true or exists.

example.ex: A survey of retired people has indicated that most are independent and enjoying life...
example.tran: 对退休人员的调查表明，大部分人都自食其力,享受生活。

example.ex: Our vote today indicates a change in United States policy...
example.tran: 我们今天的选举表明了美国政策的一种变化。

entry.def: If you indicate an opinion, an intention, or a fact, you mention it in an indirect way.

example.ex: Mr Rivers has indicated that he may resign...
example.tran: 里弗斯先生暗示他可能会辞职。

example.ex: U.S. authorities have not yet indicated their monetary policy plans.
example.tran: 美国当局尚未透露他们的货币政策计划。

entry.def: If you indicate something to someone, you show them where it is, especially by pointing to it.

example.tran: 他指着一把椅子说，“坐下。”

example.ex: Pelham moved across to indicate a wall chart.
example.tran: 佩勒姆走过去指着一张挂图。

entry.def: If one thing indicates something else, it is a sign of that thing.

example.ex: Dreams can help indicate your true feelings...
example.tran: 梦可以反映你的真实感情。

example.ex: His language indicates a poor education.
example.tran: 他的言语反映出他没受过多少教育。

entry.def: If a technical instrument indicates something, it shows a measurement or reading.

example.ex: The needles that indicate your height are at the top right-hand corner...
example.tran: 显示你身高的指针在右上角。

example.ex: The temperature gauge indicated that it was boiling.

entry.def: When drivers indicate, they make lights flash on one side of their vehicle to show that they are going to turn in that direction.

example.ex: He told us when to indicate and when to change gear.
example.tran: 他告诉我们何时打转向灯、何时换挡。

auth_sentence.content: Polls indicated the measure was gaining support amongst voters.
auth_sentence.res_content: Polls indicated the measure was gaining support amongst voters.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Polls indicated the measure was gaining support amongst voters.

auth_sentence.content: He indicated that the two sides would maintain contact.
auth_sentence.res_content: He indicated that the two sides would maintain contact.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He indicated that the two sides would maintain contact.

auth_sentence.content: But he indicated more work remains to be done.
auth_sentence.res_content: But he indicated more work remains to be done.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But he indicated more work remains to be done.

Sentence.sentence: A study in Sweden indicated that kindergarten children who could play in a natural environment had less illness and greater physical ability than children used only to a normal playground.
